alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Morrow (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:09AM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EDT FOR RICHLAND...HURON...ERIE...MORROW AND EASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 209 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Western Vermilion to near New Washington to near Mount Gilead, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Norwalk, Western Vermilion, Mount Gilead, Galion, Shelby, Willard, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, New London, Cardington, Bellville, Plymouth, Milan, Northern Milan, Wakeman, Chesterville, Greenwich and Butler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
